articles.title: Meta delays setting team budgets, likely to fire more employees soon - India Today
articles.description: Facebook's parent company Meta has delayed setting its teams' budgets, as per reports. The move comes amidst reports of further layoffs at the company.
articles.content: By Divyanshi Sharma: A couple of days back, reports of Meta planning further layoffs had surfaced as CEO Mark Zuckerberg announced 2023 as 'the year of efficiency' for the company. He had also said t… [+2716 chars]
